title: Social Web-Based e-Learning Activity Design: Strengthening Preservice Teachersâ€™ Competencies Using Learning Objects

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A process where pre-service teachers design language education activities in collaborative web-based environments, developing instructional design competencies using learning objects (LOs).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze learning object (LO) components (metadata, interaction structure) and apply them to language education scenarios.
Learners can design e-learning activities that enable knowledge sharing among learners using social web tools (forums, wikis, collaborative documents).
Project-based assessments can develop language education learning outcomes (LOs) that incorporate peer feedback and iterative improvement
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
